events.text:
This place is creepy.
That big sign on the wall says Rileyâ€™s Laboratory. 
Riley... That's the scientist my da-[pause=0.3] Gerald mentioned.
Who has a massive sign showing it's their lab, IN THEIR LAB?
Clearly someone with a massive ego. Haha!
What? I'm not jealous. 
Though it WOULD be nice to have your own lab.
Anyways, Let's look around.
